example.eg: The abstract painting represents the artist's concept of motherhood.
example.egtrans: 这幅抽象画作表现的是画家对母性的理解。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 描绘, 展现, 表现

dsense.name: represent [sb]⇒
dsense.guideword: (act on the behalf of, legally) (法律)

example.egtrans: 弗兰克的律师将为他全权代理。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 全权代表, 全权代理

example.eg: A zero represents "no" and a one represents "yes".

trans_examp.trans_cn: 表示, 等于, 相当于

example.eg: The butterfly represents a class of insects.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 作为…的代表, 作为…的样本

example.eg: He was the first American to represent Hamlet on stage.

dsense.name: represent [sb]
dsense.guideword: (act on the behalf of, politically) (政治)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 作为…的代言人, 代表…的利益

example.eg: Sarah is here to represent her boss.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 作为…的代表, 作为…的代言人, 作为…的代理人

example.eg: He represented her as a saint.
Larry represented himself as an expert.
